tips.tip: Avoid Public Wi-Fi for Sensitive Actions
tips.example: Logging into your bank account on caf√© Wi-Fi can expose your credentials.
tips.explanation: Public networks are often unencrypted, allowing attackers to intercept your data. Use a VPN when necessary.
